message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe you'll find it to be a great addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. However, I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $14000?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make sure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $13500 for it. Would you be willing to consider that price?
